text: Anatoliy Afanasyevich Turusin (; 8 May 1939 â€“ 21 February 2022) was a Russian politician. He was a member of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union and later the Agrarian Party of Russia. He was in the Congress of People's Deputies of Russia from 1990 to 1993 and the State Duma from 1994 to 1999. Turusin died in Irkutsk, Russia on 21 February 2022 at the age of 82. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Members of the State Duma Category:Politicians from Irkutsk Oblast
title: Anatoliy Turusin
